parameters.isValid: return function v(parameters, dependencies){var retObject = {};if(parameters.value<dependencies['parental_grid_ratio'].value){retObject.valid= false; retObject.message=parameters.displayName+' must be greater then '+dependencies['parental_grid_ratio'].displayName;}  else retObject.valid= true; return retObject;}

return function v(parameters, dependencies){var retObject = {};if(dependencies['end_time'].value<parameters.value){retObject.valid= false; retObject.message = parameters.displayName + ' must be earlier than '+dependencies['end_time'].displayName;} else {retObject.valid= true;retObject.message='';} return retObject;}

return function v(parameters, dependencies){var retObject = {};if(dependencies['start_time'].value>parameters.value){retObject.valid= false; retObject.message = parameters.displayName + ' must be greater than '+dependencies['start_time'].displayName;} else {retObject.valid= true;retObject.message='';} return retObject;}

return function v(parameters, dependencies){var retObject = {};if(parameters.value<10) {retObject.valid= false; retObject.message=parameters.displayName+' must be bigger then 9';} else retObject.valid= true; return retObject;}
return function v(parameters, dependencies){var retObject = {};if(parameters.value==0){retObject.valid=false; retObject.message='Select a value'} else retObject.valid= true; return retObject;}

parameters.computedResult: (function(){var val = scope.pars['wrfdomains'].value; var keys =Object.keys(val);var retString = '';for(var i=1;i<=keys.length;i++){retString+='Domain number'+i+' - South-West: ('+val[keys[i-1]].southWest.lat+', '+val[keys[i-1]].southWest.long+') North-East: ('+val[keys[i-1]].northEast.lat+', '+val[keys[i-1]].northEast.long+')';}return retString;}())
parameters.isValid: return function v(parameters, dependencies){var retObject = {};retObject.valid= true; return retObject;}
return function v(parameters, dependencies){var retObject = {};retObject.valid= true; return retObject;}
return function v(parameters, dependencies){var retObject = {};retObject.valid= true; return retObject;}
